How many people are affected by Hirschsprung disease ?,"Hirschsprung disease occurs in approximately 1 in 5,000 newborns.",GHR,Hirschsprung disease
What are the genetic changes related to Hirschsprung disease ?,"Isolated Hirschsprung disease can result from mutations in one of several genes, including the RET, EDNRB, and EDN3 genes.
